resources.name: CSES Problem Set
resources.description: A comprehensive collection of competitive programming problems covering essential algorithms and data structures
resources.whyUseful: Helped me build a strong foundation in core competitive programming topics

resources.name: Competitive Programmer's Handbook by Antti Laaksonen
resources.description: Free book covering all fundamental algorithms and techniques for competitive programming
resources.whyUseful: Clear explanations helped me understand complex algorithms like segment trees and FFT

resources.name: Errichto YouTube Channel
resources.description: Video tutorials on solving competitive programming problems and explaining algorithms
resources.whyUseful: Watching his thought process while solving problems improved my approach to problem-solving

resources.name: CP-Algorithms
resources.description: Detailed explanations of algorithms with code implementations
resources.whyUseful: In-depth coverage of advanced topics with pseudocode and examples

resources.name: AtCoder Contest Library
resources.description: Collection of high-performance algorithms and data structures for competitive programming
resources.whyUseful: Ready-to-use implementations that helped me focus on problem-solving strategies
